title: Border, 1770–90
medium:
Medium: linen, horsehair
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked grounds
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border in Point d'Argentan with a spray of foliage surrounded by garlands of medallions and floral sprays in symmetric design. Fond: bride tortillée. Modes: point mignon, petit réseau, enchainettes. Pattern outlined by cordonnet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1770–90.
1770–90. Medium: linen, horsehair
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked grounds. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-253.
